projectMesh.title: Mesh
projectMesh.description: A webpage to go with an art installation
projectMesh.about: This utilizes JavaScript animations to create a interactive webpage to go along with a art exibit.

projectBraveNW.title: BraveNW
projectBraveNW.description: A website that was created to help explore the data from New World
projectBraveNW.about: This webpage was originaly built to explore data that had been scraped from the game before it was released. After the game came out we started implementing a utility for organising the 50 vs 50 pvp event that is in the game.

projectBraveNWdb.title: BraveNW-DB
projectBraveNWdb.about: After creating the data exploration part of BraveNW, we decided to expand the project to help with 'Wars' a 50 v 50 pvp event that happens in the game. Unfortunately before this was finished, me and the person I was working on this with lost interest, and stopped playing the game.

projectStatMiner.title: StatMiner
projectStatMiner.description: A Tesseract OCR implimentation used to extract data from Overwatch 2 scoreboards
projectStatMiner.about: A program that analyzes a video of someone playing Overwatch 2, looking for a scoreboard. If it detects a scoreboard has been displayed, it uses openCV and Tesseract to extract the data shown.

aboutMe.aboutMe: Hi, I'm Evie, a passionate and skilled software developer with a flair for innovation and a strong commitment to collaboration. As a trans individual, I bring a unique perspective and diversity to the tech industry, driving me to create inclusive and forward-thinking solutions. I am a recent gratuate from Southwest Technical College's Software Development program, who has been casually coding for years. When I decided to turn coding into a career I registered at the local tech college to make sure there wasn't anything I missed, and have since graduated and am looking for my first job in the field.
